subscriptionId.description: This is a UUID, that can be used to uniquely identify any watched board of any user.

feedName.description: A string relating to a particular state-machine-name and key combo. Consider several users requesting updates whenever the details of a particular property change - this equates to a several users subscribing to the property's "feed".

title.description: This is the title from the board that the user has subscribed to watch - use when render a the subscription for the user.

description.description: This is some more detail to complement title.

startedWatching.description: A timestamp of when the user wasfirst subscribed to this feed.

launchesId.description: A standard launches object that can be used to view the board.
